title: Operational Readiness Confirmation Manifest
description: Definitive structure for the Stage 6 audit output consumed by SSC-01 (Stage 7).

stage_6_commitment_hash.description: SHA3-512^2 hash commitment of the final Stage 6 artifacts.

integrity_passed.description: Boolean flag indicating successful passage of all mandatory integrity checks (must be true to proceed to Stage 7).

timestamp.description: UTC timestamp of the completion of the Stage 6 audit.

anomalies_detected.description: List of detected D-02 anomalies or non-optimal operational flags. Empty array indicates E7.2 success.
